actions.name: Call Update API

components.html:
Payment Successful!

components.label: Content

components.html: You have received an email regarding your request details including your new Legislated Due Date and a copy of your receipt
components.label: Content

components.html: If you would like to contact the Information Access Operations representative, please Email FOI at: FOI.Requests@gov.bc.ca, or call, Phone: 250-387-1321 | Toll Free: 833-283-8200

components.label: help
HTML
components.content: Please select whether you would like to pay all or half of the estimated amount

components.label: HTML
components.content:
This total is subject to change when all records are gathered for your request, you will be notified whether
fees are higher or lower then this estimate, and will be responsible for paying the remaining fee, or receive a refund for the overage.

components.label: Pay Deposit (1/2)
HTML
components.content:
If you would like to contact the Information Access Operations representative to better clarify your request and try and reduce your fee
please, Email FOI at: FOI.Requests@gov.bc.ca, or call, Phone: 250-387-1321 | Toll Free: 833-283-8200

components.label: HTML
components.content: Please select Process Payment when you are ready to Pay Fee

components.label: HTML
components.content:
This total is subject to change when all records are gathered for your request, you will be notified whether
fees are higher or lower then this estimate, and will be responsible for paying the remaining fee, or receive a refund for the overage.

components.label: Process Payment

components.content:
